content.rendered:
If you are looking to get a cheap iPhone 6s on a Vodafone contract, then we have some deals for you.

Whether you’re a big data person or just want a cheaper smartphone without all the addons Fonehouse has a deal that can match your requirements.

Choosing an iPhone 6s contract with Vodafone is simple. Look through the deals below and click the buy now button to purchase.

Vodafone offer some great extra’s with there Red Entertainment Plan. You can choose from Sky Sports mobile, Spotify or NOW TV for the duration of your contract
.

10 iPhone 6S Contract Deals on Vodafone

iPhone 6S Contracts on Vodafone


Deal 1

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £37 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 1GB of data
  • £40 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan

Deal 2

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £39 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 16GB of data
  • £40 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan

Deal 3

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £43 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 16B of data
  • £90 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan

Deal 4

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £45 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 8GB of data
  • £90 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Entertainment Plan

Deal 5

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £45 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 32GB of data
  • £90 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Entertainment Plan

Deal 6

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £47 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 16GB of data
  • £120 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan

Deal 7

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £49 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 8GB of data
  • £150 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Entertainment Plan

Deal 8

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £49 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 32GB of data
  • £150 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Entertainment Plan

Deal 9

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £51 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 60GB of data
  • £150 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan

Deal 10

  • iPhone 6S with Vodafone – No upfront cost
  • £55 per month on a 24-month contract
  • Unlimited minutes
  • Unlimited texts
  • 40GB of data
  • £240 cashback
  • Vodafone Red Extra Plan

To see all our iPhone 6S contract deals with Vodafone, click here to view the list of deals.
